Question: On April 26, shortly after dawn, this person awoke with severe back pains.
Hints: A year and a half later, this person gave birth to her second child, Desiderio Alberto Arnaz IV, known as Desi Arnaz, Jr.
Like many budding starlets this person picked up radio work to earn side income as well as gain exposure.
This person was dubbed the "Queen of the Bs" (referring to her many roles in B-films).
